articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) and Roscosmos are preparing for the 2022 launch of the next mission in their joint ExoMars program, which is currently undergoing final testing before shipment to Kaza… [+8760 chars]

articles.author: Rob Picheta and Chris Liakos, CNN
articles.title: Greece finishes wall on border with Turkey, amid fears of Afghan migrant crisis - CNN
articles.description: Greece has finished building a 40-kilometer (25-mile) wall along its border with Turkey, amid concerns in parts of Europe that the Taliban's takeover of Afghanistan could cause an influx of people seeking asylum.
